feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas appropriately and have clear sentence structures.

overall.explanation: Overall, considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
